projects.title: Laura's Beauty Touch Service Brochure
projects.shortDescription: Elegant tri-fold brochure showcasing luxury beauty services
projects.longDescription: An elegant tri-fold brochure for Laura's Beauty Touch featuring professional photography, detailed service descriptions, pricing, and client testimonials. The design emphasizes the luxury experience with sophisticated typography and premium paper stock.
projects.challenge: Creating a brochure that conveys the premium, personalized service Laura provides while being informative and easy to navigate for potential clients.
projects.solution: Designed a tri-fold layout with stunning photography, organized service categories, clear pricing, and testimonials. Used premium paper with matte finish for an elegant tactile experience.
projects.impact: The brochure became a powerful sales tool, with 78% of clients who received it booking services. Helped communicate the full range of offerings and justify premium pricing.

testimonial.text: The brochure is absolutely beautiful and really showcases what makes my salon special. Clients love taking them home, and they've been great for referrals!
testimonial.author: Laura Sholomov

projects.title: Cohen & Associates Branded Pens
projects.shortDescription: Professional metal pens with firm branding
projects.longDescription: Premium metal twist-action pens featuring Cohen & Associates branding. These elegant writing instruments serve as both functional items for client meetings and lasting reminders of the firm's professionalism.
projects.challenge: Finding promotional items that match the firm's professional image while being practical enough for regular use by clients.
projects.solution: Selected high-quality metal pens with laser engraving for a sophisticated, permanent brand impression. The weight and feel convey quality and professionalism.
projects.impact: The pens became conversation starters in client meetings and served as valued gifts that kept the firm top-of-mind with clients and referral sources.

testimonial.text: The pens are excellent quality. Clients actually use them and keep them, which means our name stays in front of them. Great investment.
testimonial.author: Senior Partner

projects.title: Cohen & Associates Business Cards
projects.shortDescription: Sophisticated legal firm business cards with premium finish
projects.longDescription: Professional business cards for Cohen & Associates featuring clean typography, sophisticated layout, and premium paper stock with edge painting. The design conveys authority and trustworthiness essential for a law firm.
projects.challenge: Creating business cards that stand out in a conservative industry while maintaining the gravitas expected of a legal practice.
projects.solution: Used thick premium cardstock with edge painting and subtle texture. Clean, classic design with excellent hierarchy and readability.
projects.impact: The premium cards made strong first impressions at networking events and client meetings, reinforcing the firm's reputation for excellence.

testimonial.text: These business cards are impressive. The quality speaks to our firm's attention to detail. We get compliments on them regularly.
testimonial.author: Senior Partner

projects.title: Cohen & Associates Branded Mugs
projects.shortDescription: Premium ceramic mugs for client gifts and office use
projects.longDescription: High-quality ceramic mugs featuring Cohen & Associates branding, designed for use as client appreciation gifts and for office use. The elegant design makes them suitable for professional environments.
projects.challenge: Creating branded mugs that clients would actually use rather than discard, maintaining the firm's professional image.
projects.solution: Selected premium ceramic mugs with elegant two-tone design and subtle logo placement. The sophisticated aesthetic ensures they're appropriate for executive offices.
projects.impact: The mugs became popular client gifts and are regularly used in offices, providing ongoing brand visibility in professional settings.

testimonial.text: We use these mugs as client gifts and they're always well-received. They're high quality and our logo looks professional on them.
testimonial.author: Senior Partner

projects.title: Cohen & Associates Branded Mouse Pads
projects.shortDescription: Professional mouse pads with firm branding
projects.longDescription: Premium mouse pads featuring Cohen & Associates branding with anti-slip backing and smooth surface. Designed as practical gifts for clients and for office use, keeping the firm's name visible during daily work.
projects.challenge: Creating promotional items that would be useful enough to keep on desks in professional environments.
projects.solution: Designed elegant mouse pads with subtle branding and professional color scheme. High-quality materials ensure longevity and regular use.
projects.impact: The mouse pads achieved their goal of maintaining brand presence on clients' desks, with regular feedback about their quality and usefulness.

testimonial.text: The mouse pads are practical and professional. Clients appreciate them, and we use them throughout our office. Great promotional item.
testimonial.author: Office Manager

projects.title: Evia Aesthetics Retractable Banner
projects.shortDescription: Elegant retractable banner for beauty expos and events
projects.longDescription: A luxurious retractable banner stand for Evia Aesthetics featuring stunning imagery of treatments, service highlights, and brand messaging. Perfect for beauty expos, bridal shows, and in-clinic promotions. The portable design makes setup quick and easy.
projects.challenge: Creating a banner that showcases the luxury aesthetic treatments while being eye-catching enough to stand out at crowded beauty and wellness events.
projects.solution: Designed an elegant layout with professional treatment photography, service highlights, and sophisticated branding. The retractable stand ensures easy transport and professional presentation.
projects.impact: The banner has become an essential marketing tool at beauty expos and events, helping attract new clients and establish Evia as a premium aesthetics provider.

testimonial.text: The banner is absolutely gorgeous and draws people to our booth at events. It perfectly represents our luxury brand and has been key to our expo success.
testimonial.author: Clinic Director

projects.title: Laura's Beauty Touch Service Price List
projects.shortDescription: Elegant service menu with pricing and treatment details
projects.longDescription: A beautifully designed service menu for Laura's Beauty Touch featuring detailed treatment descriptions, pricing, and professional imagery. The elegant design matches the salon's luxury positioning and helps clients make informed decisions about beauty services.
projects.challenge: Creating a price list that doesn't feel like a basic menu but rather reinforces the luxury experience and justifies premium pricing.
projects.solution: Designed an elegant multi-page booklet with professional photography, detailed descriptions, and organized service categories. Premium paper and finishing elevate the presentation.
projects.impact: The professional price list helped increase average transaction value by 35% as clients better understood service options and add-ons.

testimonial.text: The service menu is absolutely beautiful and really helps clients understand all our offerings. It's become an important part of every consultation.
testimonial.author: Laura Sholomov

projects.title: Doug Uhlig Psychological Services Business Cards
projects.longDescription: Clean, professional business cards for Doug Uhlig Psychological Services featuring calming colors and clear hierarchy. The design conveys professionalism and trustworthiness essential for a mental health practice.
projects.challenge: Creating business cards that feel professional and trustworthy while being approachable for potential clients seeking mental health services.
projects.solution: Used calming blue color palette with clean typography and excellent readability. Premium paper stock conveys quality care.
projects.impact: The professional cards helped establish credibility at referral meetings and made it easy for clients to keep contact information accessible.

testimonial.text: The business cards are professional and make a great impression at networking events. They perfectly represent our practice's approach.
testimonial.author: Douglas Uhlig, Ph.D.
